```{julia}
#| label: load-modules

using Random
using Plots

include("src/generalized_born.jl")
using .GeneralizedBornModel
```

## Initialize the model

```{julia}
# Random.seed!(1234)
max_x = 5.0
max_y = 5.0
max_radius = 3.0
num = 3
model = init_model(max_x, max_y, max_radius, num)
```

## Plot the collection of circles

```{julia}
scatter(model[:xs], model[:ys], markersize=model[:rs]*50, xlim=(0.0, max_x), ylim=(0.0, max_y))
```
